author: gnsco
content: Hi, I have a question about Clique (PoA)

author: gnsco
content: I know (N/2)+1 validators need block validation in Clique. If more than half of validators do not continue to verify blocks, a new block can't be generated.

author: gnsco
content: How can we deal with this situation?

author: gnsco
content: If no blocks is generated, we can't get new validator set
